
{{alias}}( n, x )
    Evaluates a normalized Hermite polynomial.

    Parameters
    ----------
    n: integer
        Polynomial degree.

    x: number
        Value at which to evaluate the polynomial.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( TODO, TODO )
    TODO

    See Also
    --------
